stories.text:
Base – $150k OTE - $300k Looking for Enterprise Sales Executives in the Chicago, Texas, New York City, Boston, DC, and Charlotte areas.

This company really need someone who understands the value of data solutions, RPA, AI/ML model production, etc specifically. A couple of details that might be interesting....this is a venture funded, private company with a solution that allows companies to deploy machine learning more quickly. They have several major customers (Ford, Capital One, J&J, Nationwide Insurance, Astra Zeneca, to name a few) and strategic partnerships with Google, Microsoft, Amazon, Nvidia and more. Lots of very positive things!

I do find it easier to cut to the chase. If you are open to the potential of making a change and a start-up is interesting to you, I’d be interested in learning more about you to see if we have a fit or something of interest.

Please shoot me your resume at gr@valorpartners.com and I’ll get back to you quickly, or schedule a phone call if you’re qualified.
stories.title: George Is Hiring Enterprise Account Execs with Backgrounds in AI/ML/RPA
